episodes.synopsis: Sex trafficking in the U.S. is investigated through the eyes of survivors. Guest starring Blake Lively, Malin Akerman and Ashley Judd.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Visiting groups are dedicated to combating poverty in West Virginia, Haiti and Colombia.  Jennifer Garner, Alfre Woodard and Eva Longoria appear.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A look at organizations dedicated to stopping domestic violence in Atlanta and Kenya. Guest starring Mia and Ronan Farrow, and Regina Hall.
episodes.title: Episode 3

video.title: A Path Appears
video.synopsis: A coterie of celebrity activists journey around the world to expose the roots of gender-based oppression and human rights violations.
